message.content:
cs.HC, cs.SE, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper focuses on the evaluation of APIs from a user-centered perspective, which is a key aspect of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). It also discusses the design and documentation of APIs, which falls under software engineering (cs.SE). The use of semiotics to evaluate APIs relates to natural language processing (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG), as these fields deal with the interpretation and understanding of language and symbols. Finally, the paper touches on information retrieval (cs.IR) as it discusses the importance of clear and effective documentation for APIs.
